name: DispatchWorkItemFlags
desc: A set of behaviors for a work item, such as its quality-of-service class and whether to create a barrier or spawn a new detached thread.

items.name: static let assignCurrentContext: DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Set the attributes of the work item to match the attributes of the current execution context.

items.name: static let barrier: DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Cause the work item to act as a barrier block when submitted to a concurrent queue.

items.name: static let detached: DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Disassociate the work item's attributes from the current execution context.

items.name: static let enforceQoS: DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Prefer the quality-of-service class associated with the block.

items.name: static let inheritQoS: DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Prefer the quality-of-service class associated with the current execution context.

items.name: static let noQoS: DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Execute the work item without assigning a quality-of-service class.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an empty option set.

items.name: init(arrayLiteral: DispatchWorkItemFlags...)
items.desc: Creates a set containing the elements of the given array literal.

items.name: init<S>(S)
items.desc: Creates a new set from a finite sequence of items.

items.name: func contains(DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given element is a member of the option set.

items.name: func formIntersection(DispatchWorkItemFlags)
items.desc: Removes all elements of this option set that are not also present in the given set.

items.name: func formSymmetricDifference(DispatchWorkItemFlags)
items.desc: Replaces this set with a new set containing all elements contained in either this set or the given set, but not in both.

items.name: func formUnion(DispatchWorkItemFlags)
items.desc: Inserts the elements of another set into this option set.

items.name: func insert(DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> (inserted: Bool, memberAfterInsert: DispatchWorkItemFlags)
items.desc: Adds the given element to the option set if it is not already a member.

items.name: func intersection(DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Returns a new option set with only the elements contained in both this set and the given set.

items.name: func isDisjoint(with: DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the set has no members in common with the given set.

items.name: var isEmpty: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the set has no elements.

items.name: func isStrictSubset(of: DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether this set is a strict subset of the given set.

items.name: func isStrictSuperset(of: DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether this set is a strict superset of the given set.

items.name: func isSubset(of: DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the set is a subset of another set.

items.name: func isSuperset(of: DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the set is a superset of the given set.

items.name: func remove(DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> DispatchWorkItemFlags?
items.desc: Removes the given element and all elements subsumed by it.

items.name: func subtract(DispatchWorkItemFlags)
items.desc: Removes the elements of the given set from this set.

items.name: func subtracting(DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Returns a new set containing the elements of this set that do not occur in the given set.

items.name: func symmetricDifference(DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Returns a new option set with the elements contained in this set or in the given set, but not in both.

items.name: func union(DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: Returns a new option set of the elements contained in this set, in the given set, or in both.

items.name: func update(with: DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> DispatchWorkItemFlags?
items.desc: Inserts the given element into the set.

items.name: static func != (DispatchWorkItemFlags, DispatchWorkItemFlags) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.
